allow:
Bash("D:\\1-code\\__trash__\\console\\scripts\\cockroachdb-deployment.yaml" << 'EOF'
---
# Longhorn 异步快照任务（每5分钟创建一次快照）
apiVersion: longhorn.io/v1beta2
kind: RecurringJob
metadata:
  name: cockroach-snapshot
  namespace: longhorn-system
spec:
  cron: "*/5 * * * *"
  task: "snapshot"
  retain: 5
  concurrency: 2
  labels:
    app: cockroachdb
EOF)
